name: tep-gnss-site
description: Global Time Echoes: Distance-Structured Correlations in GNSS Clocks Across Independent Networks

scripts.dev: lsof -ti:8347 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && python3 -m http.server 8347
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for static site'
